name: IDBCursor.direction
description: A string (defined by the IDBCursorDirection enum) indicating the direction in which the cursor is traversing the data. Possible values are:

refs.name: Indexed Database API 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'direction' in the 'Indexed Database API 2.0' specification.

refs.name: Indexed Database API Draft
refs.description: The definition of 'direction' in the 'Indexed Database API Draft' specification.
